title: The Other Face of the Law
Death from a Flower Girl
description: Judd's client is a young girl who shot her married lover, but claims she mistook him for a burglar. He finds he must defend her "New Morality" life style as well as the murder charge.

title: Everyone Loved Harlan But His Wife
Fall of a Skylark: The Trial - Part 1
Fall of a Skylark: The Appeal - Part 2
What You Can Do with Money
The Worst of Both Worlds
description: In Juvenile Court, without benefit of counsel, 17-year-old Kenny Carter, Jr. is consigned to the county Juvenile Home for three years based on the charge of stealing and wrecking a car, for which he vaguely denies guilt. Judd steps in to uphold Carter's full rights under due process, but Carter is reluctant to cooperate, as he is concealing a terrible secret.

title: The Name of This Game Is Acquittal
description: A lady lawyer, accused of intentionally running down a woman in an alley, uses different ways to pressure Judd into taking her apparently shaky case.

title: The Sound of the Plastic Axe
Thou Shalt Not Suffer a Witch to Live
The Law and Order Blues: Part 2
Between the Dark and the Daylight
The Holy Ground: The Killing - Part 1
The Holy Ground: The Killers - Part 2
An Elephant in a Cigar Box
The View from the Ivy Tower
